rukus.text: He paigabara! Tusi' ki'um usa ciza nu harama karade ho, jihari alaha ne tuhade la'i ja'iza kiti hai. (Uha vi) apani'am patani'am di prasanata prapata karana la'i. Ate alaha vada mu'afi dena vala ate rahimata karana vala hai
Alaha ne tuhade lokam la'i tuhadi'am sauham da kholana niyata kara dita ate alaha tuhada karasaza hai. Ate uha janana vala ate hikamata vala hai

Ate jadom rasula ne apani kise patani nu ika bheda di gala hauli jihi kahi tam usa ne usa nu (bheda) dasa dita ate alaha ne paigabara nu usa tom janu kara dita, tam paigabara ne kujha (patani nala kiti'am) galam dasi'am ate kujha na dasi'am. Phira jadom paigabara ne usa nu iha gala dasi usa ne kiha ki tuhanu isa di khabara kisa ne diti hai. Paigabara ne kiha, ki mainu janana vale te ba-khabara raba ne dasi'a hai

Jekara tusim dove alaha vala paratom' tam (vadhi'am hai ki'unki) tuhade dila jhuke ho'e hana ate jekara tusim dovem nabi (di musakala) de virudha karava'i'am karogi'am tam usa da dosata alaha hai. Jibara'ila, sadacari imana vale ate inham tom sina pharisate vi usa de sathi hana
Jekara paigabara tuhanu sari'am nu talaka de dena tam usa da raba tuhade badale tuhade tom bihatara patani'am de devega. Agi'akari, saradhavana, tauba karana vali'am, ibadata karana

He imana vali'o! Apane apa nu ate apane ghara vali'am nu usa aga tom baca'u. Jisa da balana manukha ate pathara honage. Usa te sakhata subha'a de balavana farisate niyukata hana. Alaha unham nu jihara hukama deve, uha usa di ulaghana nahi karade hana. Ate uha uha hi karade hana, jisa da unham nu hukama milada hai
He inakari'o! Aja bahane na bana'o. Tusim uhi badala pa rahe ho jihara tusim karade si
